EmailTemplate.name: Missouri Tech Seminar (Clients).Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation: MO Tech Seminar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Registration Confirmation Missouri Technology Seminar
This is your confirmation that you are registered for the complimentary Missouri Tech Seminar. In this seminar you will join fellow VisiCAD users in Missouri in an interactive discussion on latest trends in technology and preparation for upgrade to VisiCAD version 5.0.
As an added bonus, we invite you to join us on Thursday from 9 AM to 12 Noon for an Emergency Dispatch Leadership Seminar hosted by St. Charles County Dispatch and Alarm. The event promises to provide educational content for all those involved in managing public safety communications. Click here for more information and to register for the Leadership Seminar.
Event Details
Date: Wednesday, December 7
Time: 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM
Location: Lake St. Louis Fire Protection District - Station 1 2533 Lake St. Louis Blvd. Lake St. Louis, MO 63367
Cost: Complimentary (Continental breakfast and lunch included)
Questions? Sally Olson-Nelson, Client Account Manager Mobile: 727.688.7001 Email: sally.olson-nelson@tritech.com
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121 l PH: 858.799.7000
